mdRecord.dcterms:title: 47th Season, 1979
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster announcing the productions of the 47th season of the Barter Theatre. A Doll House | Same Time Next Year | Misalliance | Side by Side by Sondheim | Luv | Dames at Sea | Absurd Person Singular | The Fantasticks | Another production to be announced. May 30- Sep 23, 1979.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
